{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = AC1200R 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1200 Wide-Range Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.alfa.com.tw/products/ac1200r?variant=36473960792136 |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ALFA_Network_AC1200R |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ALFA Network |model = AC1200R |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/10/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ALFA_Network_AC1200R |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AB87197D |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8197D; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra |cpu1_type_rev = RLX5281 |cpu1spd = 660 <!-- 500 / 660 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406E; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, J21 |jtag = yes,, 12-pad header,, J20
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/12/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 4718050302253 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01HFCZ3CU |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AR; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192ER; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== fcc photos show D not DN
{{Seealso|UPVEL UR-825AC}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/alfa.network/ac1200r ''AC1200R'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.yacht-wifi.com/en/alfa-network-ac1200r-2 ''AC1200R'' on '''Jacht-Wifi'''] :4x 5dBi detachable external dual band antenna
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/alfa.network/ac1200r |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:AC1200R 01.jpg| File:AC1200R 02.jpg| File:AC1200R 03.jpg| File:AC1200R 04.jpg| File:AC1200R 05.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==See also== ===Key Features=== :► AC1200 Wi-Fi - 2.4GHz (300Mbps) + 5GHz (867Mbps) :► Wireless coverage for your entire home/office :► 4x 5dBi external antennas provide maximum wireless coverage :► Easy wireless security encryption with the WPS button :► Full gigabit ports ensure ultra fast data transfer speeds :► IPv6 supported, meeting the demands for the next generation :► Simple and Easy setup wizard
===FCC ID=== :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UQ2 UQ2] - [[ALFA Network]] • [https://fccid.io/2AB87 2AB87] - ''Iconnect'' *[[ALFA Network AWUS1900]] - FCC ID: 2AB878814 (2017-06-28) :''802.11ac Dual-Band Long-Range USB Adapter'' *[[ALFA Network WiFi Pineapple NANO]] - [https://fccid.io/2AB87-NANO 2AB87-NANO] (2016-02-02) :''WiFi Pineapple NANO'' (USB 2.0, 5V/2A, 2x ext. ant.) *[[ALFA Network AWUS052NH]] - FCC ID: 2AB87572 (2015-06-11) :''Dual-Band 2.4/5 GHz Long-Range USB Adapter'' *[[ALFA Network AP120C]] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AB87934 2AB87934] (2015-05-12) :''Concurrent Dual-Radios 2.4/5GHz MIMO AP/CPE'' :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9344, WLAN Mini PCIe Card: AR9582 *[[ALFA Network AC1200R]] - FCC ID: 2AB87197D (2015-05-12) :''AC1200 Wide-Range WiFi Router'' (RTL8197D) *[[ALFA Network AWUS036NHV]] - FCC ID: 2AB878188 (2014-08-29) :''802.11bgn Long Range USB Adapter'' (RTL8188) *[[ALFA Network AWUS036AC]] - FCC ID: 2AB878812 (2014-08-26) :''802.11ac AC1200 USB Adapter'' (RTL8812AU) *[[ALFA Network Tube 2H]] - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AB879331 2AB879331] (2014-05-22) :''802.11n Long-Range Outdoor AP/CPE'' ([https://fccid.io/2AB879331/Schematics/Schematics-2274415 AR9331]) *[[ALFA Network AIP-W511]] - FCC ID: 2AB87511 (2014-05-02) :''802.11n 150M Ultra Wireless LAN Router''
[[Category:English Documentation]]
